net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets

Class PopupWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Panel
          • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SimplePanel
            • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
              • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.PopupWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasCloseHandlers<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel>, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventPreview, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.AcceptsOneWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasAnimation, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasOneWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesPopupEvents, Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>, AttributeReadClosable, AttributeReadLengthProperty, AttributeReadMaximizable, AttributeReadMaximized, AttributeReadMovable, AttributeReadResizable, AttributeWriteClosable, AttributeWriteMaximizable, AttributeWriteMaximized, AttributeWriteMovable, AttributeWriteResizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureBehaviorInsertImage.InserImagePopup, FeatureBehaviorInsertLink.InserImageLink, RichTextToolbar.FontSettingsPopup

    public class PopupWindow
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
implements AttributeWriteResizable, AttributeWriteMovable, AttributeWriteClosable, AttributeWriteMaximized, AttributeWriteMaximizable, AttributeReadLengthProperty
    This class is a Widget that represents a popup. It extends PopupPanel with additional features such as being resizable. It is an alternative to DialogBox.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • isMaximized

        public boolean isMaximized()
        This method determines if this object is maximized. In this case the size is fully expanded to cover the entire screen (also called full-screen).
        Specified by:
        isMaximized in interface AttributeReadMaximized
        Returns:
        true if the object is maximized, false otherwise.

      • setMaximized

        public void setMaximized(boolean maximized)
        This method (un)maximizes the object. If it is un-maximized, its size and position will be restored to the values before it was maximized.
        Specified by:
        setMaximized in interface AttributeWriteMaximized
        Parameters:
        maximized - - true to maximize, false to un-maximize.
        See Also:
        AttributeReadMaximized.isMaximized()

      • isMaximizable

        public boolean isMaximizable()
        This method determines if this object can be (un)maximized by the end-user.
        Specified by:
        isMaximizable in interface AttributeReadMaximizable
        Returns:
        true if the object is maximizable, false otherwise.

      • setMaximizable

        public void setMaximizable(boolean maximizable)
        This method set the maximizable state of this object.
        Specified by:
        setMaximizable in interface AttributeWriteMaximizable
        Parameters:
        maximizable - - true if a (icon) button shall be available to (un)maximize the object (window), false otherwise.
        See Also:
        AttributeReadMaximizable.isMaximizable()

      • getLength

        public Length getLength(LengthProperty property)
        This method gets the Length for the given LengthProperty of this object.
        E.g. the call of getLength(LengthProperty.WIDTH) will return the same result as AttributeReadSize.getWidth(). Unlike AttributeReadSize this method provides access to additional properties such as e.g. LengthProperty.MIN_WIDTH or LengthProperty.MAX_HEIGHT.
        Specified by:
        getLength in interface AttributeReadLengthProperty
        Parameters:
        property - is the LengthProperty identifying the actual property to get.
        Returns:
        the requested Length. Will be Length.ZERO if undefined (NOT set).

                             Direction resizeDirection)
        Adds a PopupMouseHandler to the given Widget based on the given Direction.
        Parameters:
        widget - is the Widget where to add the PopupMouseHandler to.
        resizeDirection - is the resize Direction or null for move.
